name: Human Crossing
description:
Controls: Spacebar

First of it's genre. This "Stroad Type" game let's you feel like a pedestrian crossing a street.

Assets:

Car models: https://opengameart.org/content/cars-trucks-and-a-limo

Sky picture: https://opengameart.org/content/cloudy-skies

Music: https://void1gaming.itch.io/free-action-music-pack

Made by Kartoffelsalat Studios
